description: A humorous punchline about a pig and secrets.
title: Squealing Pig
n_1: The farmer is talking to the pig in the barn.
c1_1: Hey pig, why should you never trust a pig with a secret?
n_2: The farmer grins, ready to deliver the punchline.
n_3: They both laugh together at the joke.
n_4: The farmer and pig continue their conversation, smiling.
